titleStmt.title: The faithful marriner: or, A copy of verses writ by a seaman on board the Britania in the streights, and directed to fair Isabel, his loyal love, in the city of London. Tune of, The false-hearted young man: or, the Lauguishing [sic] swain.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J[osiah]. Blare, on London-bridge.,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication and publisher's name from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
